page.title: 15HOUSING
page.content: We went round a lot of houses and saw that most of them were semi-detached. Most people had gas central heating. Double glazing was very popular and most people thought it was worth the money. Most people thought it was very difficult for young couples having a mortgage. There were no high rised flats and nearly every one said they were a bad idea. Nearly every house in the D-block has a garden and a garage.A lot of people just used the garage for storing tools. There is no new housing being constructed in the D-block.
